Reviews.Title: “nice stay in Landmark Grand”
Reviews.Author: Albina S
Reviews.Content: Very nice service, many smiles, polite, reception staff quickly reacting to our requests, most of them i like Maria, very communicative and kind lady, she speaks Russian, it's very nice!

Reviews.Title: “my stay in landmark grand”
Reviews.Author: timur b
Reviews.Content: I like the hotel vey much! Reception staff is cheerful, welcomin and helpful, especially Maria and Ahmed Ibrahim, they make you feel like a very valued guest! They helped us with all our questions. Next time we will come back again to Landmark Grand!

Reviews.Title: “Dubai”
Reviews.Author: Ia A
Reviews.Content: I stayed in Landmark Grand Hotel with my husband for 9 nights. The place is really nice and is close to the airport and the subway. Greeted us very well and very quickly taken to a room. The room is quite big and clean, the bed soft and comfortable. One minus - no clock in the room (and not just in the room, anywhere in the hotel we did not see clock). Room cleaned very well (cleaned a very nice and attentive boy), have always been very clean, and felt that the hotel is new. In principle, we all were happy, the only thing that did not like it - it's very cold swimming pool (we could not swim in it) and a small area around it. Staff at the hotel very nice and polite. Very close to us reacted Maria (also helped us a lot that she was a Russian-speaking). We liked one bill boy (unfortunately we do not remember his name, his face was like the Chinese or Japanese), he was very attentive and smiling, when we were in the loby room, he brought us the juice, if we had a suitcase, he immediately carried it, when we check out, he ran and caught a taxi, reminded us about documents. Why not be said about the other boy (to mine, he was a Hindu), when he was asked something he did not understand and was not at all attentive. Very enjoyable surprise that we had free internet, we are a big help in business. Also, we had a free transfer to the beach, but the car which we were served with very poor air conditioning, and when we returned at 12 o'clock, it was very hot. Otherwise, we are all satisfied. If we have once again come to Dubai, perhaps again dwell in your hotel

Reviews.Title: “Maria”
Reviews.Author: AbudhabiNabil
Reviews.Content: Maria has been very helpful in assissting me and my family in our stay in Landmark Grand Hotel in Dubai. She is intillegent, cultured and well-read unlike many people I know in my field of work. I fully extend my advice to you to recommend her to promote her career. She is not only a receptionest, but a travel advisor and a tour guide in her own right.

Reviews.Title: “A modern & lovely place with a high respect to their guests!”
Reviews.Author: SanazV
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in four different 4star hotels in Deira, and now I can say, Landmark grand hotel is definitely the best one. I traveled with my husband and my sister, so we had a double room with an extra bed which was as comfortable as the other bed in the room. Our room was really clean, spacious and well furnished so was the bathroom and everything. The lobby is not very big, but it has a warm and friendly atmosphere which gives you a feel of welcoming. The staff were all really polite and helpful and did their best to satisfy us. We really thank each and every one of them. Landmark grand hotel has a big restaurant which is as modern as the other sections of the hotel and they served us with a variety of the delicious food both for breakfast and for lunch & to be honest, they were really good looking & tasteful. There was just a minor point about the water warming system. There was a key on the wall that we should push for water to be warmed up before taking a shower and we did the job. But the problem was that it got cold again after about ten minutes while we were still taking the shower. Hope it will be solved soon, so I can call it a 5star hotel. :-) We did enjoy our stay in this hotel and will definitely come back again.

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: Shima2012
Reviews.Content: i stayed in Landmark Grand hotel with my friends for 4 days, the place is really nice, the rooms are neat and everything was arranged. the breakfast was very good. the location is great. we really enjoyed our stay. but unfortunately there was no pick up for Emirates airline

Reviews.Title: “new hotel.... good or bad?”
Reviews.Author: streetswalker
Reviews.Content: stayed in this hotel for our honeymoon for 4 nights, you MUST take into consideration that this is a new hotel before booking. For the new hotel: •Hotel interiors, room and furniture are beautiful, modern and shining! •Breakfast is rich and they offered new different dishes everyday •They upgraded us for a junior suite as newly married couple •They really try to make their best to make your stay comfortable and make a name Against the new hotel: •Room missing alarm clock! •Underground park entrance is very tiny and will never allow a big car •As honeymooners, I asked for some fruits, little wedding cake and some roses to be ready in the room on arrival, they charges us for that, I think they should have given complimentary. •Although as I said they try to make their best but you could still feel in many occasions they are confused or lost and do not know what to do, perhaps they should hire more experienced staff.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Roma h
Reviews.Content: great location, clean rooms , staff at reception wonderful and always helpful and ready to assist Free shuttle from airport would be great Will definitively come back

Reviews.Title: “City stay”
Reviews.Author: twinmum42
Reviews.Content: Well located hotel for 2 Metro stations. Nice comfortable modern bedroom flatscreen TV/kettle/safe.Staff friendly. Breakfast caters for all.. from cereal to hot dishes/omelettes cooked to order/fruit/cheeses/breads. Overall pleased with Hotel..except no courtesy room for late departure..had to use facilities of pool/spa area..rather cramped with suitcase in tow. Enquired about airport transfer prior to arrival but was told it was not "courtesy" as advertised and would cost around 80 dhs each. Go by Metro much cheaper..ideal for getting around Dubai and even cheaper than taxis.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: Ramtin C
Reviews.Content: I had a great experience at the Landmark. In an area with many nice hotels this place clearly stands out. The Hotel itself is great but the staff is even more amazing. We originally stayed at a different hotel but that place was so bad that we checked out at night and came to the Landmark. They accomodated us. We didn't have a reservation for the 2nd day but Mr. Pelton Gonsalves worked hard and secured two rooms for us for the remainder of our stay. He also was very helpful with directing us towards business centers and tourists attractions. We truely enjoyed our stay at the Landmark. And thank you Pelton for all your help.

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: hatem m
Reviews.Content: People in reception are very helpful, smiley and polite, special thanks to Ahmed Ibrahim! We will definately come back again to Landmark Grand!

Reviews.Title: “Airport Transfer”
Reviews.Author: GeminiAquarius
Reviews.Content: Hi We have booked for this hotel and are due to arrive this Friday-10th February at 5, but are yet to hear from the hotel about airport transfers so. We sent an email and they replied asking what hotel we are staying in, but we have heard nothing since. Not sure how to proceed, with this, as apparently being a new hotel, taxi-drivers find it hard to locate. Hotel looks lovely, and I am looking forward to our stay.

Reviews.Title: “new is always better”
Reviews.Author: EhsanBKE
Reviews.Content: first of all the staff were really polite and helpful;calm and low traffic street; room was clean and bathroom was really good with really hoooot water;despite some reviews there were tea kettle with tea bag and coffee that would be refreshed every day with room service ; the only problem was that there were no complementary water in the room but there was a supermarket nearby; breakfast was good and equal to the stars of the hotel hotel is near union metro station (only 300 meters); best location for night walking; different restaurants were in the close area; a big mall just across the street, you can find everything in the 5 min walk around the hotel; definitely will go there my next time in dubai

Reviews.Title: “Good new hotel”
Reviews.Author: zoerobinson
Reviews.Content: Firstly this is a really clean, well looked after place. I had 2 minor issues which were the most important things I look for in a hotel - sleep and internet. The noisy neighbor of my room kept me awake for all the night. I did call reception but they either didn't act or the other customers didn't listen. When I mentioned it in the morning the reception did apologise but it didn't really help my sleep. Also, the internet speed is pretty slow. I'm sure if I stayed on a different date these issues may have been fine.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rachel A
Reviews.Content: This new city hotel was very clean and well presented. The staff were very friendly and helpful, they advised us on places to visit during our stay in Dubai. The rooms are stylish and modern and the bed was extremely comfortable. I slept very well on this trip! We had a view overlooking a shopping mall and fairground. We visited Dubai during the January shopping festival, the shopping was great but unfortunately it was very noisy at night, the windows did not keep out the noise from the fair ground. The food at the hotel was very good. There was a good selection to choose from and well presented. I used the hotel gym during my stay. The gym was well equipped and air conditioned and not at all busy which made a welcome change from my gym back at home. I would have liked to have used the hotel's pool a little more during our stay but unfortunately the pool and pool area were very small and very crowded. The staff helpfully pointed out we could use their other Landmark hotel pool area a short walk away. Overall I would recommend this hotel as a great place to stay for a short city break. The hotel is minutes away from the airport and not too far to travel by taxi to shopping malls or the beach. The staff made us feel very welcome and the price was very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “hotel is really great”
Reviews.Author: Tea G
Reviews.Content: staff is very polite, I am very satisfied, Maria is the best, she helped us in everything, suggested best places to see, in Dubai, so I am very greatful for her, I think I will come back to your hotel. Thank for everything.

Reviews.Title: “Very Modern Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mohd J
Reviews.Content: we spend the new year at landmark grand hotel Dubai it was lovely stay one of the best 4 star hotel in Dubai very frindly staff , for sure we gone back to this hotel un the near future don't mees the stay in landmark grand dubi

Reviews.Title: “5 stars”
Reviews.Author: moreno16
Reviews.Content: I want to give my admiration for the character of the hotel with a modern and exciting services, as well as excellent handling of the staff. Great room. Breakfast varied and tasty and the place is very quiet and also near the metro station. Here I would like to thank loubna for the structures to help us in the big change our room three times .. For my part I commend the hotel and give him five stars.

HotelInfo.Name: Landmark Grand Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Al Riqqa Road | Deira, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
